greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = generalized binomial coefficients (n,k)_11 (n >= 0, 0 <= k <= n).
comment: For references, links, programs, etc., see earlier sequences in this series, especially A342889.
formula: The generalized binomial coefficient (n,k)_m = Product_{j=1..k} binomial(n+m-j,m)/binomial(j+m-1,m).
program: (PARI) f(n, k, m) = prod(j=1, k, binomial(n-j+m, m)/binomial(j-1+m, m));
T(n, k) = f(n, k, 11); \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 02 2021
xref: Triangles of generalized binomial coefficients (n,k)_m (or generalized Pascal triangles) for m = 1,...,12: A007318 (Pascal), A001263, A056939, A056940, A056941, A142465, A142467, A142468, A174109, A342889, A342890, A342891.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 01 2021
